documentation.text: @dev Ensures that this is not called from inside a Balancer vault operation. This avoids a reentrancy condition.

GovernorChangeRequested(address).notice: Emmited when the governor is change is requested

GovernorChanged(address,address).notice: Emmited when the governor is changed

acceptGovernance().notice: Called by the pending governor to approve the change

changeGovernor(address).notice: Changes the governor can only be called by the current governor

dryMint((address,uint256,address)[],uint.notice: Simulates a mint to know whether it would succeed and how much would be minted The parameters are the same as the `mint` function Note: This does *not* include the action of the recovery module, if any!

params.account: the account that wants to mint
params.assets: the assets and associated amounts used to mint GYD
params.minReceivedAmount: the minimum amount of GYD to be minted

returns.err: a non-empty error message in case an error would happen when minting
returns.mintedGYDAmount: the amount that would be minted, or 0 if it an error would occur

dryRedeem(uint256,(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Dry version of the `redeem` function exact outputs as specified by `tokens` and `amounts` Note: This does *not* include the action of the recovery module, if any!

params.assets: the output tokens and associated amounts to return against GYD
params.gydToRedeem: the maximum amount of GYD to redeem

returns.err: a non-empty error message in case an error would happen when redeeming
returns.outputAmounts: the amounts receivd against the redeemed GYD

gyroConfig().notice: Returns the address of the global configuration

mint((address,uint256,address)[],uint256.notice: Main minting function to be called by a depositor This mints using the exact input amount and mints at least `minMintedAmount` All the `inputTokens` should be approved for the motherboard to spend at least `inputAmounts` on behalf of the sender

params.assets: the assets and associated amounts used to mint GYD
params.minReceivedAmount: the minimum amount of GYD to be minted

mintStewardshipIncRewards(uint256).notice: Only callable from the reserve stewardship incentives module. Mints new GYD to the governance treasury.

pamm().notice: Returns the address for the PAMM

redeem(uint256,(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Main redemption function to be called by a withdrawer This redeems using at most `maxRedeemedAmount` of GYD and returns the exact outputs as specified by `tokens` and `amounts`

params.assets: the output tokens and associated amounts to return against GYD
params.gydToRedeem: the maximum amount of GYD to redeem

returns.outputAmounts: the amounts receivd against the redeemed GYD

reserve().notice: Returns the address for the reserve

gydToken.details: The GYD token is not upgradable so this will always return the same value
gydToken.return: the address of the GYD token

returns._0: the address of the GYD token
